metadata.name: Anthony Hernandez

persona.name: Angela Martinez
persona.goal: Get fast business internet with a reliable install date and a callback appointment
persona.context: Opening a new storefront in 2 weeks; needs internet for POS terminals and guest WiFi; comparing providers after a bad experience with outages
persona.tone: Busy, straightforward, wants clear next steps

intent.name: Billing Question / Dispute
intent.description: An existing customer has a billing concern and needs the right billing support path.
intent.goal: Direct them to the support portal for billing and set expectations for resolution steps.
intent.initialMessage: My bill is higher this month and I don’t recognize one of the charges—who can fix this?

emotion.name: Anxious
emotion.description: Worried about downtime or deadlines; asks repeated reassurance questions about install dates, service continuity, or disruptions.

metadata.outcome: Received direction to call support but requested more specific billing path.

turns.content: My bill is higher this month and I don’t recognize one of the charges—who can fix this?
I hear you—bills can be confusing. For help with the charge, visit https://business.comcast.com/support/home/ or call our 24/7 support line.

messages: I hear you—bills can be confusing. For help with the charge, visit https://business.comcast.com/support/home/ or call our 24/7 support line.

turns.content: I don’t really have time to dig through a website right now—can you tell me which option I pick once I call, or is there a direct number for billing so I’m not bounced around?
